title: OPEC President calls for full implementation of production adjustment agreement reached in April
description: Vienna, Austria, 1 May 2020--HE Mohamed Arkab, Algeriaâ€™s Minister of Energy and President of the OPEC Conference, has called on OPEC Members and non-OPEC oil producing countries participating in the Declaration of Cooperation to fully implement the agreements reached at the 9th and 10th (Extraordinary) OPEC and non-OPEC Ministerial Meetings held on 9 and 12 April respectively via videoconference.
